scripts.build: gulp text-domain && wp-scripts build --config webpack.config.js && gulp build:pro && npm run translate && run-p build:*
scripts.lint: wp-scripts format src/ && wp-scripts lint-js src/ --fix
scripts.fixtures:regenerate: npm run build && npm run fixtures:clean && npm run fixtures:generate
scripts.test-unit: npm run test-unit:clean && npm run fixtures:regenerate
scripts.show:savedVersion: bash -c 'npm run cli wp post meta get $0 _vkb_saved_block_version'
scripts.update:savedVersion: bash -c 'npm run cli wp post meta update $0 _vkb_saved_block_version $1'
scripts.sass:block: sass src/blocks/$npm_config_block/style.scss --style compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' build/$npm_config_block/style.css -o build/$npm_config_block/style.css
scripts.sass:blockpro: sass src/blocks/_pro/$npm_config_block/style.scss --style compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' build/_pro/$npm_config_block/style.css -o build/_pro/$npm_config_block/style.css
scripts.sass:alert: sass src/blocks/alert/style.scss build/alert/style.css --style compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' build/alert/style.css -o build/alert/style.css
scripts.watch:alert: sass --watch src/blocks/alert/style.scss:build/alert/style.css --style compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' build/alert/style.css -o build/alert/style.css
scripts.build:alert: npm run js:alert && npm run sass:alert
scripts.sass:balloon: sass src/blocks/balloon/style.scss build/balloon/style.css --style compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' build/balloon/style.css -o build/balloon/style.css
scripts.watch:balloon: sass --watch src/blocks/balloon/style.scss:build/balloon/style.css --style compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' build/balloon/style.css -o build/balloon/style.css
scripts.build:balloon: npm run js:balloon && npm run sass:balloon
scripts.sass:button: sass src/blocks/button/style.scss build/button/style.css --style compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' build/button/style.css -o build/button/style.css
scripts.watch:button: sass --watch src/blocks/button/style.scss:build/button/style.css --style compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' build/button/style.css -o build/button/style.css
scripts.build:button: npm run js:button && npm run sass:button

scripts.watch:border-box: sass --watch src/blocks/border-box/style.scss:build/border-box/style.css --style compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' build/border-box/style.css -o build/border-box/style.css
scripts.build:border-box: npm run js:border-box && npm run sass:border-box
scripts.sass:faq: sass src/blocks/faq/style.scss build/faq/style.css --style compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' build/faq/style.css -o build/faq/style.css
scripts.watch:faq: sass --watch src/blocks/faq/style.scss:build/faq/style.css --style compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' build/faq/style.css -o build/faq/style.css
scripts.build:faq: npm run js:faq && npm run sass:faq
scripts.sass:flow: sass src/blocks/flow/style.scss build/flow/style.css --style compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' build/flow/style.css -o build/flow/style.css
scripts.watch:flow: sass --watch src/blocks/flow/style.scss:build/flow/style.css --style compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' build/flow/style.css -o build/flow/style.css
scripts.build:flow: npm run js:flow && npm run sass:flow
scripts.js:heading: wp-scripts build src/blocks/heading/index.js --output-path=build/heading
scripts.sass:heading: sass src/blocks/heading/style.scss build/heading/style.css --style compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' build/heading/style.css -o build/heading/style.css

scripts.watch:staff: sass --watch src/blocks/staff/style.scss:build/staff/style.css --style compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' build/staff/style.css -o build/staff/style.css

scripts.sass:outer: sass src/blocks/_pro/outer/style.scss build/_pro/outer/style.css --style compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' build/_pro/outer/style.css -o build//_pro/outer/style.css
scripts.watch:outer: sass --watch src/blocks/_pro/outer/style.scss:build/_pro/outer/style.css --style compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' build/_pro/outer/style.css -o build/_pro/outer/style.css

scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_modules/ && npm install && npm run build
